name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  eslint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install

      - name: Run ESLint
        run: npm run lint

      - name: Run ESLint if JavaScript files modified
        if: ${{ github.event_name == 'push' && needs.changed_files.outputs.files_changed_contains_js == 'true' }}
        run: npm run lint
